name: Vanilla
description: A lovely black tea with a high quality vanilla flavor

name: Apricot
description: One of our favorites chunks of apricot and natural flavorings, maybe this black tea a mainstay

name: Plains
description: This is a Broken Leaf creation, infusing black tea with apple and a little cherry

name: English Breakfast
description: Authentic English breakfast tea will certainly get your morning started

name: Vanilla Green

name: White Cloud
description: From the birthplace of Whitecloud, the albino buffalo, this black tea has strong background of sage and apples
